topic.title: STOP SMOKING SETTING QUIT DATE TOTAL
topic.shortdesc: STOP SMOKING SETTING QUIT DATE TOTAL is the number of PERSONS in the REPORTING PERIOD with a Person Stop Smoking Episode and an Intended Smoking Quit Date.
